title: Leicester give Claudio Ranieri vote of confidence as club issues statement backing manager
text:
STAND BY OUR MAN Leicester give Claudio Ranieri vote of confidence as club issues statement backing manager 
Italian's future in doubt as Premier League champions face relegation battle but Fixes stand by their man Breaking Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments LEICESTER have issued a vote of confidence in Claudio Ranieri with the Premier League champions deep in a relegation battle. 
The Foxes have endured a miserable season after the highs of winning the title and there has been speculation Ranieri’s days as boss could be numbered. PA:Press Association 1 Leicester have issued a vote of confidence on Claudio Ranieri 
But the club have taken the unusual step of going public to defend their manager – just a day before the club face Derby in an FA Cup fourth round replay. 
The statement said: “In light of recent speculation, Leicester City Football Club would like to make absolutely clear its unwavering support for its First Team Manager, Claudio Ranieri. 
“While there is a collective appreciation from everyone at the Club that recent form needs to improve, the unprecedented success achieved in recent seasons has been based firmly on stability, togetherness and determination to overcome even the greatest of challenges.
